column5: Surround yourself with that tropical getaway feeling at the beautiful vacation retreat! From your own private, covered deck you can watch the dolphins play in the Inter-coastal waterway or drop a line to sample the fine fishing. Tasteful decor, spectacular views, and the accommodations here wrap you in luxury and will make this a favorite repeat destination. Everything you need is waiting for you- wifi included. Sleeps 6, available May thru September. No pets.
column8: Tropical Waterfront with Fishing and View
